briefTitle: Detection and Characterisation of Varicella Zoster Virus From Dermal Lesions of Chickenpox-infected Patients
officialTitle: An Open, Prospective, Non-prophylactic, Non Therapeutic Study for the Detection and Characterisation of Varicella Zoster Virus Collected From Dermal Lesions of Patients Who Are Diagnosed of Having Varicella/Breakthrough Varicella
summary: This study is conducted in order to collect clinical samples from patients who are diagnosed of having chickenpox infection. The results of this study will provide basic scientific information about chickenpox disease.

primaryOutcome.measure: Viral Load: Number of Varicella Zoster Virus (VZV) Deoxyribonucleic Acid (DNA) Copies Per Clinical Sample
